id.description: The unique ID of the order

date_modified.description: The date and time when the order was last modified

date_shipped.description: The date and time when the order was shipped

cart_id.description: The ID of the cart associated with the order

shipping_cost_tax.description: The tax amount on shipping cost

shipping_cost_tax_class_id.description: The tax class ID for shipping cost

handling_cost_tax.description: The tax amount on handling cost

handling_cost_tax_class_id.description: The tax class ID for handling cost

wrapping_cost_tax.description: The tax amount on wrapping cost

wrapping_cost_tax_class_id.description: The tax class ID for wrapping cost

payment_status.description: The payment status of the order

store_credit_amount.description: The amount paid using store credits

gift_certificate_amount.description: The amount paid using gift certificates

currency_id.description: The ID of the currency used in the order

currency_code.description: The currency code used in the order

currency_exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate used for currency conversion

default_currency_id.description: The default currency ID of the store

coupon_discount.description: The discount amount applied using coupons

shipping_address_count.description: The count of shipping addresses associated with the order

is_email_opt_in.description: Flag to indicate if customer opted-in for emails

order_source.description: The source from which the order originated

url.description: The URL for shipping address details

resource.description: The resource URL for shipping addresses

status_id.description: The ID of the status of the order

base_handling_cost.description: The base handling cost of the order

base_shipping_cost.description: The base shipping cost of the order

base_wrapping_cost.description: The base wrapping cost of the order

first_name.description: The first name in the billing address

last_name.description: The last name in the billing address

company.description: The company name in the billing address

street_1.description: The street line 1 in the billing address

street_2.description: The street line 2 in the billing address

city.description: The city in the billing address

state.description: The state in the billing address

zip.description: The ZIP code in the billing address

country.description: The country in the billing address

country_iso2.description: The ISO2 country code in the billing address

phone.description: The phone number in the billing address

email.description: The email address in the billing address

name.description: The name of the form field item

value.description: The value of the form field item

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel where the order was made

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer who placed the order

customer_message.description: The message or note left by the customer

date_created.description: The date and time when the order was created

default_currency_code.description: The default currency code of the store

discount_amount.description: The total discount amount on the order

ebay_order_id.description: The eBay order ID if applicable

external_id.description: The external ID associated with the order

external_source.description: The external source of the order

geoip_country_iso2.description: The ISO2 country code detected by GeoIP

ip_address.description: The IP address associated with the order

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the order has been deleted

items_shipped.description: The number of items shipped in the order

items_total.description: The total number of items in the order

order_is_digital.description: Flag to indicate if the order is digital

payment_method.description: The payment method used for the order

refunded_amount.description: The total amount refunded for the order

tax_provider_id.description: The ID of the tax provider
